experience: Scott can introduce you to 15 people at Oracle
Successful #Elasticsearch users are critical to our success...and yes I am in sales.
Official Alibaba Cloud - Elastic partnership announcement with Elastic CEO Shay Banon on stage at #TheComputingConference2017

Elastic is backed to the tune of $100M+ by the top VCs in the world (Benchmark, Index, NEA) and custodians/primary contributors to the open source projects Elasticsearch, Logstash, Kibana & Beats that have been download over 100 million (no shit, really) times.Elastic products are used across all industries and adopted by thousands of organizations ranging from startups to global brands including; Facebook, Goldman Sachs, Microsoft, Yelp, LinkedIn and Target.My job is to do whatever they need me to do (that's legal) to help the company achieve lead, pipeline and revenue objectives. I am but a humble awesome, amazing, funny, deceptively athletic servant.

Supported $22m Series B fund-raise by delivering to pipeline/revenue goals. Secured numerous pre-funding press coverage and assisted CEO on funding pitch deck along with lining up top-named customers for reference calls.

Completely rebuilt and streamlined marketing operations, measurement, analytics and processes to scale demand generation and consistently hit MQL and pipeline targets.Introduced new multi-view attribution model that measured pipeline and revenue contribution in order to better invest and tune marketing programs.Created consistent reporting and dashboards in SFDC.Partnered to improve productivity of sales development team by building lead programs to target capacities and optimize leads with scoring and quality metrics.

Direct product marketing and strategy over organization acquisitions in Complex Event Processing and Data Replication.Focus on growing commercial business presence.Develop sales strategy and work directly with field to introduce  and close prospects.Push new marketing programs.Engage industry analysts to create leading position.

Equilar provides information subscription products for benchmarking and tracking: executive compensation, board compensation, equity grants and award policies and compensation practices.Well over 2,000 organizations leverage Equilar products and research either directly or through consulting partners. Over 800 companies directly subscribe to Equilar's on-demand products including leading pay advisors and consulting firms. Top business media including The NY Times, Wall St. Journal and CNBC regularly cite our research.

Scott was the only marketeer in the Equilar history to bring humor to the Executive Compensation Domain by inventing Seymour Cash. The Seymour Cash cartoon still appears in every C-Suite Magazine 6 years later and remains the most popular part of the magazine. Yes, he also invented the magazine and published the first issues. One of the most brilliant marketing campaigns I've ever seen. Scott is a unique and rare marketer who is creative, innovative, understands business strategy, and can execute. Best of all, he is fun to work with.

Darwin Singson
Global Product and Use Case  Enablement at Informatica
May 23, 2012, Darwin worked with Scott in different groups

In my role heading up Sale Enablement initiatives, I have worked with Scott on numerous programs to help drive both performance and field readiness to our global sales, pre-sales and partner community.As a key subject matter expert, Scott takes complicated topics and makes them simple... takes simple topics and makes them interesting... and takes interesting topics and makes it memorable.  Lastly, and most importantly, he takes memorable topics and makes it motivational, as he effortlessly moves his sales audience to clearly see and act upon the opportunities in front of them.  There are few folks that can deliver this with the enthusiasm and energy Scott consistently brings to these sales training sessions.On a personal note, Scott is one of those guys that you can't wait to call upon, as he not just brings his positive nature with him but good humor as well.

Senior Manager- Elastic{ON} Events at Elastic
July 15, 2016, Scott managed Katy Sue directly

I consider myself very lucky to work with Katy both as a manager and peer. She's a star that has been thrown in the deep end of programs (entire 2K+ people user conferences and regional events) - and she not only swims, but can make it look effortless (does the backstroke at freestyle speed). She brings tremendous organizational skills/tasking, calm demeanor and poise to the job every day. I've seen her command our entire company's attention and respect in multiple organizational presentations (both live and remote). I've witnessed her balance stressful situations requiring immediate and direct attention but do so in very positive, productive ways.It's clear that Katy will deliver amazing value to any organization and with any job she takes on. However, if you consider recruiting Katy away from this organization I will hunt you down!

summary: Defining “great marketing” is simple – generating positive attention to improve and sustain sales opportunities. Executing great marketing is the challenge.  I bring innate ability + 15 years of proven, award-winning, 'bury-the-box' technology marketing experience across enterprise and consumer software, Internet and hardware.Extremely rare mix of experience/disciplines including business strategy, product marketing, public and analyst relations, direct marketing and corporate marketing.Absolute executor - track record for doing so many good things that I kept running out of room on the track, it's safe now, in the cloud.Public & Analyst Relations (top PR agency in the world) experience working with startups, and large organizations like HP and CompaqStudent of innovative corporate strategy - Worked with the father of "Core Competence" and #1 on "The Worlds' most important and influential business thinkers" list (http://www.thinkers50.com/), C.K. Prahalad for two years.Specialties: Revenue goals and marketing campaigns to support lead gen and standout awareness through business closing and reference.
